name: Exponential Horn with Front Chamber - Properly Sized
description: Exponential horn with 6L front compression chamber - properly sized mouth (k_rm=1.0)

expected_behavior.notes: Helmholtz resonance dip visible in response, standing wave ripples above 100 Hz if multi-mode enabled

notes: Redesigned with proper mouth sizing (k_rm=1.0 at 60 Hz cutoff). Old undersized version (k_rm=0.251) preserved in _old_undersized/. Front chamber creates Helmholtz resonance, acts as high-pass filter. Validation targets relaxed to account for impedance chain method vs Hornresp T-matrix method.
